text: Sosibius (; lived 3rd century BC) was a Tarentine, one of the captains of the body-guards of Ptolemy Philadelphus (283-246 BC), king of Egypt. It is not improbable he may have been the father of Sosibius, minister of Ptolemy Philopator (221-204 BC). ==References== * ==Notes== Category:Ancient Tarantines Category:Ptolemaic generals Category:3rd-century BC Greek people
title: Sosibius of Tarentum
